SVGFEImageElementHeight.summary: The height read-only property of the interface describes the vertical size of an SVG filter primitive as a .

remarks.para: It reflects the {{SVGAttr("height")}} attribute of the feImage element, which fetches image data from an external source and provides the pixel data as output. The attribute is a <length> or a <percentage> relative to the height of the filter region. The default value is 100%. The property value is a length in user coordinate system units.
